title: A Fable for friendship
creator_credit: Jiri Trnka, Czechoslovak State Film and Unesco
brief_description: Animated fable to show what can be achieved by the exchange of ideas and skills between peoples. Explains that the Y shape of the new UNESCO headquarters building is a symbol of the meeting place where peoples of 100 nations come together to benefit from what each has learned in the field of education, science and culture.
